# 新概念模拟电路5-源电路（信号源和电源）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-5-yuan-dianlu-xinhaoyuan-he-dianyuan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-5-yuan-dianlu-xinhaoyuan-he-dianyuan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-5-yuan-dianlu-xinhaoyuan-he-dianyuan
xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-5-yuan-dianlu-xinhaoyuan-he-dianyuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-5-yuan-dianlu-xinhaoyuan-he-dianyuan
xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-5-yuan-dianlu-xinhaoyuan-he-dianyuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
